original_text: God will forgive all the Israelites and the foreign people who live among you. That is because your sin was a mistake. And also you offered the proper sacrifices to me.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중과 그들 중에 거류하는 타국인도 사함을 받을 것은 온 백성이 부지중에 범죄하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: God will forgive all the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 이스라엘 사람들을 용서하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and the foreign people who live among you
That is because your sin was a mistake
And also you offered the proper sacrifices to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 너희가 나에게 적절한 제물을 드렸습니다
